resources.string: Your IT Problem Our IT Problem - Call us for a solution

Hello everyone, 
BUGS is the brainchild of two guys with a computer backgroung, to devote their free time to try solutions to problems arising from the use of technology. 
As is now well known, the use of technology is part of our everyday life (computers, smartphones, tablets, etc …) but not everyone can integrate their use during their day. 
BUGS intervenes precisely in this: to help and support those who encounter problems while using this equipment. So should you have a hitch, front of the PC for example, simply call us to book the withdrawal of the product directly to you and once you've solved the problem, you will be conveniently returned home!
